subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Orange set a university record for most consecutive victories to start a season and Coach Jim Boeheim tied Adolph Rupp for fourth place on the career win list with No. 876.
snippet: The Orange set a university record for most consecutive victories to start a season and Coach Jim Boeheim tied Adolph Rupp for fourth place on the career win list with No. 876.
